pl.bristleback.server.bristle.api.action
Interface SendCondition<T extends IdentifiedUser>

All Known Implementing Classes:
AllUsersCondition
public interface SendCondition<T extends IdentifiedUser>

Basic filter interface, used to determine message recipients. In most scenarios, application creators should define custom implementations of this interface, however Bristleback provides few built in filters, mainly in LogicalConditions class.

Author:
Pawel Machowski created at 01.05.12 14:12
See Also:
Logical filters, All users filter

Method Summary
 boolean isApplicable(T user)
          Checks if message should be sent to given user Used in message senders
 

Method Detail

isApplicable

boolean isApplicable(T user)
Checks if message should be sent to given user Used in message senders

Parameters:
user - The examined user.
Returns:
true if message should be sent, false otherwise.
